section1.title: Front-End Developer
section1.p1: Hi, I'm Laury. As a front-end developer, I enjoy creating modern and responsive websites.
section1.p2: I love design and making each site unique.
section1.p3: I'm mostly self-taught and very dedicated to everything I do.
section1.p4: I always enjoy learning and trying new tools to improve my work.
section1.p5: I enjoy turning code into something others can see, use, and enjoy.
section1.p6: If youâ€™d like to know more about me or work together, feel free to contact me

section2.title: Some Projects
section2.subtitle: Where code becomes experiences
section2.proj1:

section2.proj2:
This online store gives a fast and simple shopping experience. Itâ€™s great for any business that wants to sell products online.

Users can: See products with images and descriptions, Add items to the cart and check the order summary and Use discount coupons and finish the purchase easily.
section2.proj3:
This website is made for people who want to get Italian citizenship. It has a clear structure and is easy to use. The information is organized, reliable, and looks good.

You can find details about different ways to get citizenship, see the Italian lawyer, visit social media pages, and more. It is a great site for anyone who wants to offer a service in a clear and nice way.
section2.proj4:
This memory game was made to test the userâ€™s focus and visual speed.

The goal is simple: find all the matching card pairs using the fewest tries. It gives a fast, fun, and nice-looking experience for all ages. The game is easy to play, but it also makes you think.
section2.proj5:
This game was made especially for kids: itâ€™s easy to play, fun, and looks nice. It has a friendly and colorful interface. Just one click makes the cat jump â€” very simple controls.

Great for children: it helps with reflexes, focus, and coordination. Soft animations and cute visuals make the game more friendly.
